page.title: 08EDUCATION IN GT.WAKERING
page.content: IN OUR AREA THERE IS ONLY ONE SCHOOL, GREAT WAKERING COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL. THE CHILDREN FROM GREAT WAKERING VILLAGE WHO ARE BETWEEN THE AGES OF 5 AND 11 ATTEND FROM MONDAY TO FRIDAY. THE CHILDREN BETWEEN THE AGES OF 11 AND 16 ARE BUSSED OUT TO THE SECONDARY SCHOOL AT ROCHFORD. THERE ARE 461 CHILDREN ON THE REGISTER THIS YEAR AND THERE ARE EIGHT JUNIOR CLASSES AND SEVEN INFANT CLASSES. MY TEACHER IS MRS. PIRIE AND THE OTHER THIRD YEAR TEACHER IS MR. FIELDING. THE BUILDING IS VERY BIG FOR A PRIMARY SCHOOL AS IT WAS ORIGINALLY BUILT AS A SECONDARY SCHOOL . IT WAS BUILT IN 1955 AND BECAME A PRIMARY SCHOOL IN 1968. THE OLD PRIMARY SCHOOL IS NOW A YOUTH CENTRE. WE ARE PRODUCING A PLAY CALLED "PETER PAN" FOR THE END OF TERM CONCERT.
